channel.title: Anime Buddy on Shoko
channel.description: Recent content in Anime Buddy on Shoko

item.title: Anime Buddy Discontinued
item.description: Over the past couple of months, we’ve been asked about the development status of Anime Buddy. While we originally intended to keep updating it, multiple issues have made this near impossible for us without essentially creating a brand-new program. Anime Buddy has not received any updates in years and with the major changes we’ve made in the past couple of versions, we’d be looking at a near rewrite of Anime Buddy to just get it functional again.
